pretty good. the wait times for survivor and killer are messed up, the survivor wait times are much shorter but the time for the killer is very long. that being said, it's the only issue I have with the game. everything else such as the game play, level design and the connection to the DbD servers is very good. also this game is NOT pay to win. the DLC just adds a different play style NOT a straight upgrade or an overpowered ability. I have been playing the game without DLC and I have not once felt that DLC killers are unfair or not fun to play with.

Ok, so, there has been a few changes after playing this game for, if im not mistaken, 8-6 months now. I see this game as a love and hate relationship, in which there are various things that can make it fun and more unique, but at the same time a lot of things that have been added that are hated by the community, myself included. Gameplay is either a wait simulator where you can do other tasks to avoid being killed, or have much more options being the killer but have a harder life because of how genuinely easy playing survivor is. Not much i can say on this game except its either a fun game when it works as intended, and it sucks when its bugs appear, or BHVR finds a way to ruin it bit by bit. Example is the new eternal blight update, where you have these cool skins... behind a battlepass. You have a beautiful map... with broken features such as no wall limit. You either love the game when it works and looks beautiful, or you hate the game because of how broken it gets. With friends it can be fun, i shall admit; specially killing your own friends and be killed by them, but thats a story for another day.

As someone who plays the game casually on and off, let me warn you. The game has a decent learning curve, both as a Solo Survivor and Killer. I'd study up with videos or watch streamers to really understand the core gameplay. Starting out (especially if you're in this to be a Killer) take time to really evaluate how you want to play.

The gameplay itself is rather simple at a first glance, but you get a real feel for what the game is once you're in a chase. I play to learn and get better slowly but surely. There's not much else I can complain about. The horror aspect loses its touch after a while but if you're starting out, I assure you that you'll get lots of thrills in. As far as it goes, this community is honestly pretty nice if you're a low to mid-rank player. You'll have sore losers or bad apples here and there for both sides of the coin but you pull your punches. I will have a bit of forewarning for if you climb to the high ranks, which is past Rank 8ish. I myself am not a high-rank player but the mentality many high-ranking survivors have is rather unhealthy and toxic at times. Think its just a superiority complex kinda thing but that's in every game community. 

Here's some advice to any new players who pick the game up or want to pick the game.

For starter survivors, don't be afraid! Courage is the first step at getting better. If you mess up skill checks, its fine. It's important not to panic and not to run away immediately at the first mistake. Pay close attention to see which of your fellow survivors are around you or if they're in trouble and do what you can to ensure those generators get done and the gates are open. Listen to your heartbeat and be devious. Learn your perks and play in your best interests. Find friends that you can trust and escape together!

For starter Killers, its about approaching situations calmly and weighing your options. Your goal shouldn't be to aim for a complete slaughter (though trust me when i say its satisfying when you do), but to understand three things: map awareness, your killer's power, and choosing which chases are worth it and which aren't. You'll probably run into many groups of friends or high ranked survivors but don't be discouraged. Learn from those crushing defeats and use that knowledge to kill the next unlucky bunch of survivors. 

To finish, this game has certainly come a long way from the first few killers and I'm pretty happy with where its gone. New gameplay, new maps, new perks and new characters to play and enjoy. The dev and support teams listen to feedback (though some may say they don't!) so props to them.

EDIT:

As of recently, the game has sharply declined in interest for me. Mostly because the novelty stops for me after a while. It has its moments, but I'd like to see more from the isometric team vs juggernaut genre in general. My earlier review advice has kind of been thrown in the gutter with questionable balance changes, lack of foresight on QA and PTB (Player Test Beta) feedback before letting patches through and above all, the MMR and toxicity. The MMR system is its own problem (specifically for the killer side) but the toxicity continues to fester. Would really like to see BE address that.

The other thing that needs to be addressed is BE's collective decision to support NFTs. While they do not actively engage in the selling of them through the in-game store or anything sketchy like that, they are effectively supporting and enabling a harmful practice and should be held accountable. 

DO NOT BUY/SPEND ANY MORE MONEY ON THIS GAME. I'd say boycott by not playing but considering that there are many that do not know or could care less, its the next best thing. BE needs to realize the error of their decision. This is not fostering good will and the more people that purchase this will continue to harm the environment. Reader, if you haven't, please educate yourself on the dangers of NFTs and I strongly recommend anyone that loves this game purely from a gameplay standpoint to please consider the effect your support for this game will have.

As my friend aptly put:

NFTs? More like NO F****ING THANKS!

Stay safe people.

Juego ya muy conocido por la comunidad gamer en general , un buen survival horror con mecanicas simples pero divertidas , un juego el cual debes trabajar en equipo 100% si eres sobreviviente , variedad de personajes y habilidades para no aburrirte en pocas horas. Muchos critican que los personajes son pagos de dlc pero son baratos y ponen rebajas todo el tiempo.
Игра позволяет избавится от запора на начальных порах, потом же вы будете ржать в лицо маньяку, но изредка все-таки даже самые бравые игроки отложат пару-тройку кирпичиков))
Помойка с отсутствием баланса, но играть можно.
Extremely Fun Game! I love this game it is a nice change from other games I play. If you even have a slight thought of getting it... do it. Definitely worth it!

You may be overwhelmed from the start by amount of information you need to know about certain killers and perks.. But once you invest something around 80hours to the game.. I think you will enjoy it! The adrenaline when chased by the killer or the satisfaction of wining mind games againts the killer is truly worth it!

there's a lot more to this game than people think. there's a lot of problems with the game that you'll notice the more into it you get, but oh fuck i remember how scared i was when i first played. it was such a good game in the beginning when i had no clue what the hell i was doing and it was just as good when i wasn't scared anymore and actually learned how to play and started understand. it becomes a whole new game once you understand how to play, it's awesome.

community can be toxic sometimes, and by the nature of the game you WILL be facecamped sometimes but all games have unique fundamental flaws. I'd reccomend this game as a mind-gamey strategy game and less as a scary game because once you understand how the game works it's not scary anymore.

キラー専です。ゲームバランスが崩れている。
プレイヤースキルの問題もありますが
・サバイバー全滅を目指す場合パークが固定になってしまう。（全滅できるとはいってない）
・サバイバー側のパークも毎試合同じ構成、似た構成で新鮮味が無い。
・発電機修理の速度がおかしい（一人約80秒、二人約47秒、約三人38秒、約四人36秒さらにパークで加速）
・試合時間6分全逃げ
・2吊り2逃げのバランスを目指す
・サバイバーが逃げ切れているので問題無い
・サバイバーを転すことを目的とせず楽しんでくれ
・キラーをやりたくないならシヴィライゼーションをやれ
・板前屈伸ライトカチカチ
・ゲート前屈伸ライトカチカチ
・アップデートごとにサバイバーが有利に
以上のことから殺人鬼となって爽快にプレイしたい方にはプレイするほど時間と健康を削られるだけのゴミゲーとなるのでオススメしません。

ไม่ต้องถึงขั้นพิมพ์คุยกัน หรือ voice chat ก็ได้ครับพรี่ เอาเป็น quick chat สำหรับคน solo ให้มันมีที่ยืนมาบ้างก็ได้ 

มุม Sur:

survivor จากที่เล่นง่ายกว่ามาตลอดอยู่แล้วพอโดนปรับงี้ไปก็สมดุลขึ้นเยอะ perk หลากหลายขึ้นแต่แปลกที่ความสนุกลดลง ทำอะไรพลาดนิดหน่อยรู้สึกมีผลกับเกมมากกว่าแต่ก่อนมากๆ ละก็เรื่องเดิมกับ ระบบแบนห่วย cheater บาน
-----------------------------------
มุม Killer:

ก่อนหน้านี้ตัวเดินโดนบุ้บี้ มาแพทซ์นี้เล่นสนุกมาก ไล่ๆล้ม bloodlust ขึ้นไว ทำทุกอย่างไวขึ้น สิ่งที่ Killer ควรได้รับก็มาถึงซะที แต่บาง perk ที่ combo กับบางตัวละคร op ไป ถ้าสิ่งเหล่านี้ตกในมือคนเล่นเก่งนี่ยิ่งไม่มีภาพเซอร์จะชนะเลย
-----------------------------------
ภาพรวม :

แพทซ์นี้ฆาตกรมันเล่นง่ายขึ้นเยอะ ถ้าคนเล่นเป็นหน่อยเจอ survivor มาแบบ solo ก็แทบจะ gg แล้ว
ยิ่งถ้า perk ครบ add-on เทพไม่ต้องพูดถึง ถ้าเล่น nurse อีกคือเกมพัง เหมือนเจอเนิสต้องมาวัดว่าเนิสจะน้องหรือเนิสจะเล่นเก่ง ถ้าเนิสน้องก็มีลุ้นรอด แบบนี้หรอครับ วิธีแก้ทางในฉบับเกมเอาตัวรอดมันหายไปไหน แพทซ์เก่าคือเล่นตัวอื่นโดนบู้บี้ ฆตกที่พอสู้ได้สูสีก็มีแต่ nurse แต่แพทซ์นี้ก็คือ nurse เทพซ่าสุดๆ

UPDATE: Error code 111 is seriously affecting my own gaming experience with DBD, wherein I am demotivated to play knowing that for every escape/death as a Survivor or going through a Trial as a Killer will result to nothing (most of the time, no Bloodpoints are awarded due to said error code or rank update error is encountered sometimes). I know that BHVR said that they're working on a fix for these issues but while the issue exists, I probably will either play less or take a pause on DBD.

-

A game to both like and dislike, but the experience is always new and great for every match either as Survivor or Killer.

A 7/10 in my book.
